jobDescription: Bosley, Inc, the world's largest internationally known esthetic medicine practice is offering an exceptional opportunity.  With 70 offices across the nation and over 40 years of experience, we can offer you a unique working experience. We are seeking a dedicated, hard-working flexible technician to join an advanced group of surgical hair restoration experts during outpatient surgery. Our Patient Experience and results is our main focus, providing top notch care and service is a must.  Duties include: prepping the room and the patient; setting up the surgical tray; assisting the surgeon during the procedure; working under a microscope to dissect tissue; providing the patient with post-operative instructions; and answering questions from the patient. Our procedure takes anywhere from 6-9 hours per patient.  Full training provided. This is a non-smoking facility during working hours.  We provide an excellent compensation/benefits package including: medical; dental; vision; life insurance; 401k; and paid parking or transit up to $250.00.
